	sortcites=false,
	natbib=true,

	url=false,

	urldate=long,
	maxbibnames=99,
	maxcitenames=2,
	uniquelist=false
    ]
link-citations: yes

# special case for PDF and table as they otherwise wont work
if (knitr::is_latex_output()) {
    options(knitr.table.format = "latex")
} else {
    options(knitr.table.format = "html")
}
